headline: Assessing Dow’s Valuation As Restructuring Cuts 4,500 Jobs And Accelerates AI And Automation Investment
summary: Dow (DOW) is in the spotlight after launching an aggressive restructuring program that includes about 4,500 job cuts, or 13% of its global workforce, along with new investment in AI and automation. See our latest analysis for Dow. Investors have reacted strongly to Dow’s restructuring and cost focused plan, with a 30 day share price return of 14.97% and a 90 day share price return of 41.69%. However, the 1 year total shareholder return sits at a 9.7% decline, which points to improving...
